title: I'm Retired You're Not Have Fun at Work Tomorrow Ladies T-Shirt
features: 100% cotton (preshrunk). Ash is 99%/1% cotton/poly, Sport Grey is 90%/10% cotton/poly. This shirt has seamless double needle collar with double-needle sleeves and hem with a taped neck and shoulders.
The design is printed with new age printing technology, direct-to-garment. It is printed with a water-soluble and eco-friendly ink.
It is cured with a heat treatment process to ensure the color-fastness and lasting durability of the design.
Designed and printed in the United States.

This is not an unauthorized replica/counterfeit item. This is an original inspired design and does not infringe on any rights holders rights. Words used in the title/search terms are not intended to imply they are licensed by any rights holders.
